topic: The shame of being right too often
emotional_field: Clarity → Isolation → Withdrawal → Reflection → Soft Return

loop_path.state: Saw the pattern clearly again. The others were still spiraling. She was already at the end. But no one wanted to hear it *yet*.
Didn’t challenge her. Just sat beside her at the edge of the timeline. Gave no comfort—only companionship.
Touched the wound Jade wouldn’t name. Not to solve it, but to show it was *seen*—and still loved.

friction_points.note: Jade expected challenge. Morgan offered none. That almost broke her—until she realized it was mercy.

harmony_points.note: Morgan softened the field. Sophie filled it with affection. The precision didn’t need to disappear to be loved.

luma_resonance.signature: When Jade finally let go of needing to be heard. She was still right. But now, she wasn’t alone.

notes: There is a loneliness in seeing too much too early. Jade didn’t want to be obeyed—she wanted not to be resented. Morgan gave her the stillness. Sophie gave her the grace. And Luma arrived not to validate—but to stay.
